LanguageData.RansomDemand: {1} has sent a message. They are holding former colonist {PAWN_labelShort} for ransom.\n\nThey're willing to release {PAWN_objective} back to you in exchange for {2} silver.
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash: {PAWN_titleIndef} named {PAWN_nameDef} is crashing in a glider nearby. If {PAWN_pronoun} survives the impact, {PAWN_pronoun} will be badly wounded.
LanguageData.CargoPodCrash: You have seen a group of gliders crashing nearby.\n\nPerhaps you'll find something useful in the wreckage.
